name: Breakout (itch) (PKGames)
description:
Hello and Welcome!

This is my second game using game editor ct.js (https://ctjs.rocks/) from CoMiGo (https://comigo.itch.io/). This is a Breakout game with 10 levels to play.

If you want to download the full ct.js project of this game:
https://pkgames.itch.io/breakout-full-ctjs-project

Sprites and sounds made by Kenney (https://kenney.nl/).

Have Fun and Happy game making!
